message.content: Use the get_fact tool for both 'cactus' and 'swift', then summarize both facts.
{"content":"Cacti store water in thick stems to survive arid climates.","name":"get_fact"}
{"content":"Swift is a type-safe language that emphasizes expressive syntax and performance.","name":"get_fact"}

The cactus stores water in its thick stems to thrive in dry environments. Swift is a modern programming language designed for performance and safety, emphasizing clarity and efficiency. Both facts highlight adaptabilityâ€”whether through biological resilience or software design.
